publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1620 Mary Scanlon: World Suicide Prevention Dayâ€”That the Parliament recognises World Suicide Prevention Day on 10 September 2004 and notes that this represents a call for action and involvement by all governments and organisations worldwide to contribute to suicide awareness and prevention through activities, events, conferences and campaigns in each country.
S2M-1620 World Suicide Prevention Day (lodged on 18 August 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1620 World Suicide Prevention Day (lodged on 18 August 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-1620 World Suicide Prevention Day (lodged on 18 August 2004) John Scott*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1620 World Suicide Prevention Day (lodged on 18 August 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
